title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Nominate Elaine Duke as Deputy Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
January 30, 2017
The President today announced his intent to nominate Elaine C. Duke of Virginia to be Deputy Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security. Ms. Duke has more than 28 years of experience with the federal government including service as the Department of Homeland Security’s Under Secretary for Management.
